attributes.action: SECURE POST43 for our FREE POSTAGE to Afganistan and Iraq to be continued to be free always after December's review decision of 2kg parcels to be sent to our troops from our families and friends..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are men and wemen risking thier lives daily for this country in Iraq and Afganistan.  The greatest morale booster that these brave men and wemen can recieve is regualar and speedy contact with thier families.  Equally, the greatset comfort that the families can recieve is regular personal contact with thier husbands, wives, sons, daughters and any other relative serving in Irqa and Afganistan. Full free postage and communication for these families is a price our grateful nation should be prepared to pay. with thanks to everyone who has supported this campaign for Maria Dodsworth and Mr David Cain

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
